title: What is Ibn Sirin's interpretation of a dream about visiting a deceased person in their home?

preview.text:
"Dream Interpretation of a Living Person Visiting the Dead in Their Home:

Dreams of a living person visiting the deceased in their home are among those with many disturbing meanings for the dreamer. However, many interpreters agree that the dream is an indication of the deceased's need for mercy and the dreamer's longing for this deceased person. Other meanings depend on the dreamer's social status and the situation in which they saw the dream.

Ibn Sirin's Interpretation of the Dream of the Living Visiting the Dead in Their Home:

The scholar Ibn Sirin states that a living person visiting the deceased in their home indicates a great need to pray for them, and giving charity will significantly contribute to improving the material conditions and thus the living conditions of the dreamer.

Visiting the home of the deceased is a sign that the dreamer will actually visit this house in the near future, either for a wedding or a funeral, and this depends on several details that the interpreter must know from the dreamer. Ibn Sirin also confirmed that the entire interpretation is good, as it indicates good fortune for many who will come into the dreamer's life, and God knows best.

Dream Interpretation of a Living Person Visiting the Dead in Their Home for Single Women:

Visiting the home of the deceased in a single woman's dream indicates that she is a good girl who fears God in all her actions, meaning that she adheres to her religion and the morals that her family raised her on, making her a beloved person in her social environment. In the near future, she will have great significance, achieve a distinguished position, and realize dreams that are greater than her aspirations.

If she sees that she is visiting the home of her deceased father and signs of happiness appear on her face, this indicates that she will soon hear good news, as there is a good chance that this news will be related to her marriage. It is also confirmed that she will marry a man who looks to God in her and strives to make her happy as much as possible.

A single woman visiting the home of the deceased where it is dark and she is miserable indicates that she will face problems in the near future despite her best efforts and will not be able to find a way out.

Dream Interpretation of a Living Person Visiting the Deceased in Their Home for a Married Woman:

This dream often indicates that the woman will go through a difficult period in her life and will completely lose her ability to cope with this period. She will find that her husband does not stand by her. The married woman's dream indicates that she is currently surrounded by a series of bad news that comes to her one after the other. However, the dream is a sign of her perseverance and her ability to overcome any obstacle that comes her way. The dream also indicates that she will have good fortune that will come into her life.

If the married woman sees that she is visiting the home of a deceased person who was famous in his life in an academic field, the dream predicts that one of her children will have a great and distinguished position. The dream also indicates a move to a new and better home.

Dream Interpretation of a Living Person Visiting the Deceased in Their Home for a Pregnant Woman:

A pregnant woman visiting the deceased in their home, and the home is organized and clean, indicates that the coming period in her life will be more stable and that she will be able to get rid of all the pain and problems that control her. The dream indicates that she will give birth to a healthy child, and she will be free of any disease or health complications, but if the home is disorganized and dirty, this indicates that she will face many health problems and difficulties during her pregnancy, and the dream is a warning to her to take care of her health and not ignore the advice of her family and doctors.

If the dreamer has a close relationship with the deceased's family, this indicates that she will actually visit this house soon, but if she feels heavy in her chest when visiting this house, this is an indication that she is carrying many responsibilities, which make her feel weak all the time.

Dream Interpretation of a Living Person Visiting the Deceased in the Hospital:

As for visiting the deceased, but in the hospital, this is a sign that the dreamer will receive a message related to this deceased person or their family. Interpreters believe that the dreamer will engage in charitable work in the near future, because they wish to deal with God in good deeds.

Al-Nabulsi had another opinion on the interpretation of this dream, as he sees the dream as a warning message to the dreamer about the need to stay away from the path of sin and draw closer to God by all means, to avoid the path of loss and misguidance and disregard the idea of losing in this world.

Dream Interpretation of the Living Visiting the Deceased in the Cemetery:

Some interpreters have indicated that the living visiting the deceased in the cemetery is an indication that the dreamer will face great suffering in the coming period and will not be able to face the problems that will suddenly appear, as they exceed their capacity and ability to endure.

Visiting the grave of a celebrity who has a bad past indicates the need to draw closer to God and leave the path of sin, but if this person is beloved in his world and has many accomplishments, this is a sign of receiving a large sum of money in the near future.

Dream Interpretation of a Deceased Father Visiting the Home:

A father visiting the home of the deceased is an indication that he will face a major crisis in the coming period, which will make him need the help of others. The dream also symbolizes the father's great need for begging for charity on his behalf.

A deceased father visiting the dreamer's home is a sign that the father has debts hanging around his neck and wants his son to pay them off.

A Deceased Father Visiting His Daughter in a Dream:

A deceased father visiting his daughter is a sign that she will enjoy a peaceful and stable life and that God will give her good offspring.

A deceased father visiting his married daughter's home is an indication that she will excel in her work and will achieve many accomplishments in her life, becoming a source of pride for her family.

If signs of anger appear on the father's face, this indicates that the daughter has committed many sins and must repent from them.

Dream Interpretation of a Deceased Person Visiting Their Family:

The deceased visiting the dreamer's family indicates that many good tidings will reach the dreamer's home. The nature of this news depends on the state of the family..."

title: Interpretation of Playing with Children in a Dream According to Ibn Sirin

preview.html:
html

Interpretation of playing with children in a dream Children are the flower of life and its beauty, and there is no doubt that playing with them brings out the negative energy that we possess, so dreaming of playing with children in a dream is something that some people are happy to see. We will provide you with the interpretation.

Playing with children in a dream

  • The interpretation of playing with children varies according to the social status, as well as the type of play itself, for the game is a sign of distraction and distance from God Almighty.
  • There is an interpretation that says that a single girl who sees herself playing with children and is happy and enjoying her time with them, this is evidence of the good that will lead to that girl.
  • And a single woman who watches children playing with love, this may indicate that one of the righteous young men is watching her and his desire to marry her.
  • And in the case of seeing them playing with children with their toys, then the toys fall from the dreamer's hand, this is evidence that we are wasting time on useless matters.
  • It may indicate playing in a dream with children, but without enjoying, and the dreamer may overcome sadness, because this may express the obstacles that may prevent the dreamer from achieving his goals.
  • And the child approaches the dreamer to invite him to play with him by taking a small cat, this is evidence of the dreamer's good qualities and his good reputation among people.

Playing with children for Ibn Sirin

  • The interpretation of seeing playing with children lags behind, for it has meaning at Ibn Sirin , which is disobedience and pursuit of worldly pleasures.
  • While seeing a woman married in a dream playing with children, it can represent sustenance, kindness, happiness, and evidence of a happy married life.
  • A married woman's dream of playing with children is an indication that she will give birth to a child who will fill her life and complete her happiness.
  • Playing alone with children in a dream is evidence of her kind and giving heart that fills her.
  • If children run in a dream to the dreamer to play with him, this is evidence that he is a loving person who enjoys kindness and mercy.

Playing with children of a man

  • If a man sees children playing in a dream, it is an indication that joy and happiness will be coming soon.
  • Seeing him playing with children is a harbinger of the good that will come to him without delay.
  • And in the case of boys playing with the man who has the vision, and he sees that he is known to them, this is good news that he will be freed from his judgments.
  • Playing children for a man may indicate the extent of his enjoyment of a happy married life, and playing may show his love for his wife.

Crying children in a dream

  • A dream of a crying child can indicate crises and disasters that the dreamer is exposed to and what makes him mentally exhausted.
  • But if the dreamer sees a child crying in a dream and his mental state is good and helps him stop crying, this is an indication that all the problems that the dreamer will find will be overcome.

Children's clothes in a dream

  • The interpretation of seeing children's clothes varies according to the situation in which they are worn and the dreamer. Seeing children's clothes for single women is evidence of kindness, permanence, and many achievements that this girl has made.
  • But if the children's clothes are dirty, it may indicate the difficulties that this girl will face.
  • For a married woman, seeing children's clothes means that good things will happen to her, and if she wants to have a child, this is good news of pregnancy.
  • And the child's clothes for a pregnant woman is evidence of the woman's childbirth.
  • And white children's clothes lead to an abundance of kindness and goodness.
  • As for colored clothes, they may indicate a beautiful life, pleasure, and fun.
  • And the more beautiful and expensive the children's clothes are, the more good news there is for a new life.
  • And Buying clothes for children is often a very important sign of the arrival of a child who will fill his life, and the more beautiful clothes he buys, the more beautiful the child is.

title: Dream interpretation of a brother's wife in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

We will interpret it for an unmarried woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a man, for example, to see a deceased brother – the father of the husband or the deceased brother – or I see my brother's wife pregnant, or I am teasing my brother's wife, or my brother's wife, or my son's wife, or my brother's wife beats me according to Ibn Sirin, and others in the continuation of the matter: Interpretation of the brother's wife in a dream Seeing the brother's wife in a dream indicates that the dreamer will gather his strength and confess his feelings to his beloved. And whoever sees his brother's wife in a dream, in the event of problems between them or the like, the visionary must re-examine himself and correct the situation between them. And you see that your brother's wife is holding your hand in a dream indicates that she and her brother are thinking of helping you with some wedding arrangements. If the dreamer is not married and sees his brother's wife in his dream, it means that he thinks about her a lot and thinks about finding your comfort and happiness and he can help you find a husband. title: Dream interpretation of a house roof for a single woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman

preview.html:
html

Seeing the ceiling in a dream means that the head of the household is damaged and other interpretations will be explained for the unmarried girl, the married woman, and the pregnant woman , the divorced woman, and the man, such as a part of the ceiling falling, or a crack, or a hole in the roof of the house from which water falls, or a room without a ceiling, according to Ibn Sirin , and others in the continuation of the topic:

Interpretation of the ceiling in a dream

  1. The ceiling in a dream is a symbol with many meanings, it indicates protection and high spirit, and shows the head of the household or the one who takes care of it, such as the father or the older brother .
  2. Seeing the ceiling falling in a dream indicates the presence of a plague that afflicts the owner of the house, and also indicates the lack of adaptation to the circumstances of life, whether professionally or family.
  3. Seeing a ceiling of deer falling in a dream means fear of something, and seeing a ceiling torn by a storm in a dream indicates caution against enemies and envious people.
  4. To see yourself climbing the ceiling in a dream means success on a professional level, and seeing the ceiling of the house in a dream means good hospitality.
  5. Seeing the ceiling of the house burning in a dream symbolizes wealth, while repairing the roof of the house is a sign of growth and improvement in your financial circumstances.
  6. Seeing a hole in the ceiling of your house in a dream indicates that there is a flaw in dealing with your feelings towards those around you.
  7. Seeing someone on the roof of your house is a sign that the exploiting people around you are interested in you.
  8. Seeing the ceiling being rebuilt in a dream means that you are accumulating debts, and seeing a child falling from the roof of the house is an indicator of the need to exercise caution and care for people close to you, as one of them is in danger.
  9. Seeing a woman falling from the roof of the house is a sign of abandonment and relinquishment of the relationship and attachment to the woman (for men).
  10. Seeing yourself walking on the roof of the house without fear indicates success in work and love and that your behavior is balanced and balanced.
  11. To see yourself walking on the roof of the house and there is a slip or crack, the dream indicates mistakes in your professional or family life, perhaps illness or a financial crisis.
  12. Seeing a stranger falling from the roof of the house is a sign of getting rid of the enemy.
  13. Seeing a cat on the ceiling in a dream indicates a problem, and seeing the ceilings of holy places is a sign of happiness and contentment.
  14. Seeing stars and planets under the ceiling indicates the destruction of the ceiling. If you see it as if you were above the ceiling and you don't know how to get down, this is a sign of imprisonment. Improving economic conditions.

Interpretation of the ceiling falling in a dream for Ibn Sirin

If you see a ceiling falling in your dream, you will be subject to sudden destruction.

Seeing the ceiling of the house falling on the unmarried girl, this is an abomination and a great sorrow, the house falling for the unmarried girl shows the brother or the father, in a very simple sense that the ceiling of the house for the unmarried girl shows her support in life, and this vision shows the bad state that the seer is going through.
This bad state may be due or resulting from a disaster that befalls the father or brother or is between her and the brother or father.

And seeing the ceiling falling with great sorrow, this defilement may be an illness or a material loss, and may indicate the death of the father or brother in cases where the ceiling may collapse or the ceiling may collapse sometimes shows the death of a specific person , but this sign for the unmarried girl does not mean death, but something abominable that will reach the father or brother, or a bad relationship or illness for that father or brother, and with great sorrow.

And in the case of a married woman seeing the ceiling falling, this vision indicates marital problems, and it was said that the secrets of her house were revealed to her.
And the appearance of a hole in the ceiling indicates problems and anxiety, and the father may be disliked.
As for the married woman, it may indicate the occurrence of something bad to the husband, so some interpreters said in this vision that there may be death to the father or to the husband.

And the vision dust falling from the ceiling in a dream, this vision shows money and livelihood, and repairing the ceiling is a solution to existing problems and perhaps a cure for a sick person.

If he sees the open ceiling in a dream, it appears that this house needs attention from the housekeeper.
In addition to seeing the ceiling cracked and cracked, this vision indicates family discord and the emergence of problems between family members.
Whoever sees a vision of water falling from the roof of the house is a warning of great good, God willing, may He be praised and exalted, so much so that some commentators said that unexpected good means great good.

Seeing a house without a ceiling in a dream is not a good vision because it often warns of future problems, because the house symbolizes the stability of the dreamer's status in society, and the ceiling indicates protection from all kinds of disasters.

If you see a house without a ceiling in a dream, it is a symbol of great danger. Try to be careful even with the trifles of the house. In addition, a house without a ceiling in a dream indicates direct contact with powerful but unrighteous people.

Seeing a building without a ceiling in a dream means that you should prepare for the fact that some unusual events will shock you soon, and sometimes this vision is a sign of separation from your lover.

And if the roof of the building falls in a dream, this means that you will have a serious quarrel with your partner and it will lead to the beginning of coldness and isolation in the relationship.

As for the dream catcher Miller, he said that if you see a piece of land around a house without a ceiling, this confirms that you will suffer from an unexpected disaster, and if you are trying to build a ceiling, this is a symbol of success in your life path.

Dreaming of seeing a new house but incomplete means that you will hear news of the death of another person and if you live in an incomplete house without a ceiling, this indicates a loss of property or health and also shows their fears about completing the project or project.

If you see an old building without a ceiling in a dream, this indicates disappointment from someone close to you.

Interpretation of the ceiling falling in the accountant's dream

Whoever sees that the roof of his house has been demolished, that is, the death of its owner, and whoever sees that the roof of his house is dripping with water, then he cries because a dead or sick person will befall him. If he sees clinging to it, then his condition is at the expense of decline as long as he clings to it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about buying a ring according to Ibn Sirin

preview.text: Dreaming of buying a ring signifies successful work and other interpretations. We will explain this for the single woman, the married woman, the pregnant woman, the divorced woman, the man, like buying a gold ring, or buying a silver ring or a new ring from a jeweler or a jeweler Ibn Sirin. And more continuing the topic: The interpretation of buying a ring in a dream, seeing the purchase of a ring in a dream, announces kindness and states that you will get a new job and clarifies that you will earn money and feel happy. Anyone who buys a ring in a dream, if he is single, he will marry a good ring, and if he is married, he will get rid of problems and difficulties. Sometimes, seeing the purchase of a ring indicates the purchase of a new car or a new house, and the vision is an indication that the money you get will be well spent and you will do a lot for others with it. Seeing the purchase of a shining ring in a dream is an indication that there is a woman in your life who thinks about precious things like money and property, and according to a woman wearing a shining ring in a dream, it is a sign of happiness, abundance and good news. As for the dreamer if he is a young man and saw himself buying a shining ring, this is a sign of sadness, and if there is more than one shining ring in the dream, this means poverty and they will go through some kind of trouble. Buying a shiny silver ring in a dream is a sign of good news, and if the ring is rusty, it is a sign of false news or false information. Buying a ring in a dream is a sign that you are not interested in reality, and the dream interpreter Miller mentions the meaning of the dream in which you buy a ring for yourself, where he said that it shows that you are not completely happy with the way you want it. Your relationship with your lover continues. Seeing the purchase of a ring for a lover in a dream means that you are ready to take responsibility for him, but if you buy a ring for a friend, this means that the relationship between you may go in a different direction than you expected. If you see that you are buying a ring for yourself in a dream, this means that you will be tortured by doubts about the correctness of your actions. The experience of trying on the ring for a long time and getting it in the end means that you are doing an unpleasant job. To see the purchase of a ring that does not fit your size means that you should not engage in a business for the success of which you doubt. If you gave your lover an engagement ring in a dream, this means that you will soon receive a marriage proposal from him, but if you took a ring from your lover, this means that you need to think carefully before making any decisions, because you may be experiencing strong feelings at that moment, whether good or bad. So you can make a mistake because of the impact of these feelings on your decisions. Buying a wedding ring in a dream, but giving it to someone other than your lover, means that you need to think about the fact that the person you have next to you is not the person you need. If you see how you buy a gold ring in a dream, this means that you should expect wealth. Buying a gold ring with a stone in a dream, if this stone is precious, this symbolizes the great help that you will provide to others, and if the gold ring has a glass stone, this is a sign of deception. Buying a silver ring in a dream means that you will soon have the opportunity to find out whether your friends are real or not. And if you dream that you are buying a silver ring with a jewel inside, this means that you will meet a person who will become your close friend. If you buy a stylish ring in a dream, this means that you will have contact from people close to you who you have not communicated with for a long time. Whether you buy a modest wooden ring in a dream, this means that a surprise awaits you in life, or an event will happen that you did not expect before. Seeing the purchase of an engagement ring in a dream indicates a comfortable life with a loved one and happiness in marriage. Buying a plastic ring in a dream indicates disappointment and illusion. Buying a copper ring in a dream means that you are not honest with your friends. In general, buying a ring in a dream often expresses kindness, because it is an indication that you will enter a new job, earn a lot of money and be happy with it, and for the dreamer who receives a ring if he is single, this is a sign of his marriage, and if he is married, he is married. It is a sign of his liberation from the problems he faces, and sometimes expresses the purchase of a new house or car, and a sign that he spends the money he earns in a legitimate way. The interpretation of buying a gold ring in a dream If you dream of buying a gold ring, this indicates the money and possessions that you will get easily, and indicates that you will soon hear promising news. Whoever saw himself buying a gold ring means that he will meet someone he longs for, and whoever saw himself buying a gold ring from someone indicates a happy marriage, and whoever buys a ring or wears a gold ring in a dream, he will marry. If a person is married and sees that he is buying a gold ring, this means that he will be at odds with something that lasts a long time between him and his wife. Buying a gold ring in a dream represents finding quick ways to earn money easily, so if you are waiting for some results or news and see yourself buying a gold ring, this means that good news is on its way to you. Seeing a dreamer buy a gold ring from someone indicates a happy marriage with his best friend. The interpretation of buying a silver ring in a dream Seeing the purchase of a silver ring in a dream means that the person who dreams will have a profitable business, live a comfortable life and receive good news, and the person who sees himself wearing a silver ring, this indicates people who are closely related to their religion. And seeing the silver ring shine indicates true news, while the rusty ring indicates false and false news. Buying a silver ring in a dream is an indication that the dreamer will start a good job and have a large income, and at the same time expresses comfort, purity of heart and happiness. For those who see themselves wearing a silver ring in a dream, it represents his knowledge of a religious person. The interpretation of buying a diamond ring in a dream Dreaming of buying a diamond ring indicates that the woman loves expensive things, money and possessions. Whoever sees himself wearing a diamond ring will have some things that will cause him misery. As for the woman who wears this diamond ring, this means that she will receive good news and feel joy, and seeing a lot of diamonds in a dream indicates financial problems and poverty.
